pages.text: Brachydectes is a 50 cm long Lysorophian amphibian that lived from the late Carboniferous to early Permian periods. Brachydectes had a rather small head and reduced limbs, which seems to be a hallmark for Lysorophians.
$(l)Eats:$() Meat$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Meat$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Moss/Log Eggs$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
